content: 11 12 14 14 from each edge for larger sizes if you prefer a wider neckline only seam 13 per side neck as shown measures 10 wide sleeves with double pointed needles or circular needles if using magic loop method and beginning at underarm pick up and knit 26 26 30 34 sts around armhole place marker for bor note if you do not want to use either dpns or magic loop method you can knit the sleeves flat simply pick up two more sts total 28 28 32 36 and seam after bind off knit until piece measures 8 5 8 5 7 5 7 5 from armhole add length here if desired bobble all sts repeat for second sleeve weave in ends and enjoy no need for blocking abbreviations bobble bind off bor beginning of round sts stitches round round st st stockinette stitch alternate a knit row with a purl row ws wrong side over easy page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2019 - for personal use only over easy schematic mona and ama both wearing size 2 over easy page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2019 - for personal use only
